SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName, d.address, d.warehousing, d.truckage, d.remark, d.principal, d.tenant_id, d.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (d.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.delete_Flag = 0
AND d.name LIKE '%${name}%'
ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.tenant_id = #{userId} AND d.name = #{name} AND d.delete_Flag = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT into erp_depot( id, name, address, warehousing, truckage, remark, principal, tenant_id, is_default, create_time )VALUES( #{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{warehousing}, #{truckage}, #{remark}, #{principal}, #{userId}, #{isDefault}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.`name` houseName, d.address, d.warehousing, d.truckage, d.remark, d.principal, d.tenant_id, d.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (d.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_depot d WHERE d.id = #{id} AND d.tenant_id = #{userId} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
